de.esoco.lib.expression.function

Interface Validation<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.Function<T,Validation.ValidationResult>
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Validation<T>
extends java.util.function.Function<T,Validation.ValidationResult>
    A functional interface that produces instances of Validation.ValidationResult upon the validation of input values.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Validation.ValidationResult
      A class that represents the result of some validation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Validation.ValidationResult apply(T rValue)
      Default implementation that invokes validate(Object).
      static <T> Validation<T> ensure(java.util.function.Predicate<T> pIsValid, java.lang.String sInvalidMessage)
      Returns a new validation that checks a value with the given predicate and returns the corresponding Validation.ValidationResult.
      Validation.ValidationResult validate(T rValue)
      Validates the input value and returns a corresponding Validation.ValidationResult.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.function.Function

        andThen, compose, identity

    • Method Detail

      • ensure

        static <T> Validation<T> ensure(java.util.function.Predicate<T> pIsValid,
                                java.lang.String sInvalidMessage)
        Returns a new validation that checks a value with the given predicate and returns the corresponding Validation.ValidationResult.
        Parameters:
        pIsValid - The predicate that checks a value for validity
        sInvalidMessage - The message to be displayed if the validation fails
        Returns:
        A new validation instance

        Validates the input value and returns a corresponding Validation.ValidationResult.

        Returns:
